attributes.action: Deport the family relatives of Terrorists and strip them of British Citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
This was part of the reason why I deceided to take this action due to the social reactions:
http://www.msn.com/en-gb/news/world/paris-terror-attacks-mother-of-suicide-bomber-says-he-did-not-mean-to-kill-anyone/ar-BBn4jf0?li=AAaeUIW
attributes.background: Due to the recent attacks in France, I feel that its time for more action to be taken against these terrorists and punish them severely, and to deter potential would be terrorists from killing anymore innocent people

rejection.details:
British citizens cannot be deported. You can find more information about that here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/identifying-british-citizens-and-others-exempt-from-deportation

The Government already has the power to deport people when the Home Secretary has decided that their removal from the country is 'conducive to the public good'.

A court can also recommend deportation if someone is convicted of a criminal offence with a prison term.
